title: Naked Dining ~Love, Life and Liberation~
overview: Ichijo Futa spends his days as an impeccable high-spec man. However, he finds a way of life after falling in love unexpectedly. Ichijo likes to eat naked -- his way to relieve stress after working overtime until morning -- and he falls asleep at his grandmother's house. One day, Miki Mahiro, his grandmother's friend who runs a fruit and vegetable store, comes into the house and happens to witness Ichijo eating naked, which is Ichijo's secret that he has been keeping from anyone until now.
